trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Alligator Turtle can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Alligator Turtle has advantage on Stealth checks to Hide in water, mud, and swamps.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Alligator Turtle hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can Grapple the creature in its jaws (escape {@dc 12}). When Grappling a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If it is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the Alligator Turtle, it takes a bonus {@damage 1d4} damage.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: The Badger takes the Dash action, but must end this movement closer to a hostile creature.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Badger has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: When the Bat makes a Perception check with its hearing it treats a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10. It loses this benefit and its Blindsight if it is {@condition Deafened|XPHB}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Black Bear has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Black Bear hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can Grapple it in its jaws (escape {@dc 11}). When Grappling a creature, the Black Bear cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Black Bear takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (2). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and a target equal to the Black Bear's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: If the Boa Constrictor takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Serpentine
entries: The Boa Constrictor counts as two sizes smaller for the purposes of moving through passages.

trait.name: Thermal Vision
entries: The Boa Constrictor knows the exact location of any warm-blooded creatures within 30 feet.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. This attack has advantage against {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creatures.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 12}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target is {@condition Restrained|XPHB} and it can't Grapple another target.

action.name: Crush
entries: The Boa Constrictor forces one creature that it is Grappling to make a Strength saving throw ({@dc 12}). On a failure, the creature suffers one level of {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB}.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Boar takes damage it reduces it by its Constitution modifier (1). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: When the Boar moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Tusk attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. The Boar can then use its bonus action to use its Stomp against it.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Day)
entries: When the Boar would be reduced to 0 points, but not killed outright, it falls to 1 hit point.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Desert Dweller
entries: The Camel has advantage on all saving throws to resist hostile effects of desert environments.
It can also survive up to 15 days without food or water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h} The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against all targets other than the Camel until the beginning of the Camel's next turn.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Cat has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: When the Cat moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, then hits a creature equal to its size or smaller with a Claw attack, the target is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

reaction.name: Reflexive Fall
entries: When the Cat falls, it can use its reaction to reduce any falling damage by its Dexterity score (15). If it reduces this damage to 0, the Cat lands on its feet.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Cheetah has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the Cheetah moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. If it falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}, the Cheetah can then use its bonus action to make one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Sprinter
entries: When the Cheetah takes the Dash action while walking, its speed triples, and opportunity attacks against it are made with disadvantage until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Spotted Camouflage
entries: The Cheetah has advantage on all Stealth checks to Hide in grasslands.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Chicken falls at least 10 feet it can glide 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it falls. When the Chicken uses this trait, a Medium or smaller creature can hold on to the Chicken's feet to glide along with it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Opposable Thumbs
entries: The Chimpanzee can manipulate tools and objects as well as a Commoner, though it can't use weapons, shields, or complex artisan's tools.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl
entries: The Chimpanzee throws a Tiny (or smaller) object it is holding. {@hit 5} to hit, range 25/50 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Crab can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Crab has advantage on Perception checks to smell creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Crab also automatically succeeds on Perception checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile it is while underwater.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Crab has advantage on Stealth checks to Hide while underwater or when it is covered with sand, mud, or dirt.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: When the Crab hits a target with its Claw attack it can automatically Grapple the target (escape {@dc 6}). If the target is larger than the Crab, its speed is not reduced to 0, but the Crab automatically moves with the target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage, and it uses Pincer.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Dolphin moves 20 ft. in a line then hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Slam, it is {@condition Stunned|XPHB} until the start of the Dolphin's next turn.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: When the Dolphin makes a Perception check using its hearing, it treats a roll of 9 or lower on the {@dice d20} as a 10. The Dolphin loses this benefit and its Blindsight if it is {@condition Deafened|XPHB}.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Dolphin can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes while it is underwater.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Dolphin has advantage on attack rolls against targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Dolphin.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Electric Eel can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Electrosense
entries: While underwater, the Electric Eel knows the exact location of any living creature within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: Opportunity attacks are made at disadvantage against the Electric Eel while it is underwater.

action.name: Shocking Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus ({@dice 1d4}) lighting damage, and the creature cannot take reactions until the start of the Electric Eels next turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Emu has advantage on any attack rolls against targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Emu.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. This attack deals a bonus ({@dice 1d6}) damage against {@condition Prone|XPHB} targets.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and a target equal to the Emu's size (or smaller) is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The Emu takes the Dash action, but it must end its movement closer to a hostile creature.

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Falcon adds double its Proficiency Bonus to its Perception checks (included above).

trait.name: Aerodynamic
entries: If the Falcon takes the Dash action while it is flying, its speed triples, and opportunity attacks against it are made with disadvantage until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Dive
entries: If the Falcon moves 40 ft. straight down in a line then hits a target with a Talons attack, it deals a bonus {@damage 1d6} damage on hit. If the target is equal to the Falcon's size (or smaller) it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6+3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Agile
entries: The Firefly has advantage on all Dexterity ability checks and saving throws while using its flying speed.

action.name: Illumination
entries: The Firefly emits (or ends) bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light 10 feet beyond that.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Fish can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Fish has advantage on Perception checks to smell creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Fish also automatically succeeds on Perception checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile while it is underwater.

trait.name: Shimmering Camouflage
entries: The Fish has advantage on Stealth checks to hide while it is underwater.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The Fox has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The Fox takes the Disengage or Hide action.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Frog can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The Frog can do a long jump of 10 ft. and a standing jump of 5 ft. without a running start.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Badger has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that incorporate its sense of smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The Badger takes the Dash action, but it must end its movement closer to a hostile creature.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Beetle ends its turn while flying it falls to the ground, but it takes no falling damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: If a creature makes a melee attack against the Beetle, the Beetle can unfurl its reflective wings to impose disadvantage on the triggering attack.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5-6}
entries: If the Centipede hits a target with its Bite attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 11}). On a failure, it takes {@damage 3d6} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}. On a success, it takes half as much poison damage and is not {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the Chicken ends its turn while flying it falls. Whenever it falls at least 10 feet it can glide 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it falls. When using this trait, a Large or smaller creature can hold on to the Chicken's feet to glide along with it.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
entries: The Chicken uses Strength, in place of Charisma, for Intimidation checks (included above).

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. This attack deals a bonus ({@dice 2d6}) damage against {@condition Prone|XPHB} targets.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Crab can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Crab has advantage on Perception checks to smell creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Crab also automatically succeeds on Perception checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile while it is underwater.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Crab has advantage on Stealth checks to Hide while underwater or when it is covered with sand, mud, or dirt.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: When the Crab hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack it can automatically Grapple the target (escape {@dc 11}).

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Fish can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Bottom Feeder
entries: Underwater, the Fish has advantage on Perception checks to smell creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. The Fish also automatically succeeds on Perception checks to smell dead creatures within 1 mile while it is underwater.

trait.name: Shimmering Camouflage
entries: The Fish has advantage on Stealth checks to hide while it is underwater.

trait.name: Ram
entries: If the Fish moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target with its Slam, it rolls one bonus damage die. If the target is Large (or smaller) it is knocked back 20 ft. in a line.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Frog can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: Once per turn, the Frog can expend 5 feet of its movement to long jump up to 20 feet, or high jump up to 10 feet, even if this exceeds is remaining speed.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: If the Frog hits a creature it is Grappling with a Bite attack, it can swallow it. While swallowed, a creature is {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, it has total cover from attacks and effects outside of the Frog, and it takes ({@dice 2d4}) acid damage at the start of each of the Frog's turns.

At the start of each of its turns, the Frog must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC is the total damage it has taken since the end of its last turn) or a swallowed creature lands {@condition Prone|XPHB} in an unoccupied space within 5 ft.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, and a target smaller than the Frog is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 12}) and {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, and the Frog cannot Bite another target.

trait.name: Ram
entries: When the Goat moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, then hits a creature with a Headbutt attack, it rolls one bonus damage die, and if the target is equal to the Goat's size or smaller it is knocked back 25 ft. in a line.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Goat has advantage on saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} or moved against its will.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: If the Lizard takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Lizard has advantage on Stealth checks to Hide in natural environments.

trait.name: Sticky Grip
entries: The Lizard can climb up sheer surfaces and upside down without making an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shed Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the Lizard is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} or takes damage it can shed its tail to automatically escape from the Grapple or reduce the triggering damage to 0.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Rodent has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Rodent has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Rodent.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The Rodent can Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Hivemind
entries: For each additional Soldier Ant or Ant Queen within 30 ft., the Soldier Ant gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls. ability checks, and saving throws (maximum +10).

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: When the Soldier Ant hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can Grapple the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 12}). When Grappling a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

trait.name: Worker
entries: The Soldier Ant counts as two sizes larger for the purpose of its carrying capacity and the amount of weight it can push, pull, drag, or lift at once. Its speed is also not halved while it is Grappling a creature.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Tortoise takes damage it can reduce it by its Constitution modifier (3). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Withdraw
entries: The Tortoise recedes into its shell gaining a +2 bonus to Armor Class and resistance to all damage except for force, psychic, and radiant damage. However, its speed is reduced to 0 and it can't use its Bite attack.
As an action, it can emerge and return to normal.

trait.name: Agile Flight
entries: The Wasp has advantage on Dexterity ability checks and saving throws while using its flying speed.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5-6}
entries: If the Wasp hits a creature with a Sting attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 10}). On a failure, it takes {@damage 3d6} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}. On a success, it takes half as much poison damage and is not {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Arachnid
entries: The Spider can climb sheer surfaces, upside down, and along webs without an ability check. It also ignores movement restrictions caused by webs and it can sense other creatures touching the same web as it.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5-6}
entries: If the Spider hits a creature with its Bite attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 11}). On a failure, it takes {@damage 2d6} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}. On a success, it takes half as much poison damage and is not {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Web Strand
entries: The Spider shoots a thin strand of webbing at a target it can see within 20 ft., forming a continuous line of webbing from where it is standing to the target.

trait.name: Ram
entries: When the Goat moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, then hits a creature with a Headbutt attack, it rolls one bonus damage die, and if the target is equal to the Goat's size or smaller it is knocked back 10 ft. in a line.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Goat has advantage on saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} or moved against its will.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The Hare has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of hearing.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The Hare can do a long jump of 10 ft. and a standing jump of 5 ft. without a running start.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The Hare can Dash, Disengage or Hide.

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Hawk adds double its Proficiency Bonus to Perception checks (included above).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Hawk has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Hawk.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4+2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Ambush Hunter
entries: The Heron has advantage on Stealth checks to Hide in marshes and swamps, and creatures have disadvantage on any ability check made to detect the Heron while it is standing still.

trait.name: Ambush Strike
entries: If the Heron hits a creature with its Beak attack while it is unaware of the Heron, the attack deals a bonus {@damage 2d4} damage on hit.

trait.name: Hunter's Strike
entries: The Heron adds double its Proficiency Bonus to Perception checks (included above).

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: When the Horse moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Hooves attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and the Horse can use a bonus action to make another Hooves attack.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick
entries: When a creature the Horse can see enters its reach it can make one Hooves attack against it.

trait.name: Keen Hearing & Smell
entries: The Hunting Dog has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Loyal
entries: The Hunting Dog has advantage on saving throws to resist the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} and {@condition Frightened|XPHB} conditions while there is a conscious allied creature within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Hunting Dog hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can Grapple the creature in its jaws (escape {@dc 11}). When Grappling a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: If the Komodo Dragon takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Komodo Dragon hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can Grapple the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 12}). When Grappling a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus ({@dice 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and a target equal to the Komodo's size (or smaller) falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: If the Lizard takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The Lizard has advantage on Stealth checks to Hide in natural environments.

trait.name: Sticky Grip
entries: The Lizard can climb up sheer surfaces and upside down without making an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shed Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the Lizard is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} or takes damage it can shed its tail to automatically escape from the Grapple or reduce the triggering damage to 0.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The Llama counts as one size larger for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Llama has advantage on saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} or moved against its will.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h} The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against all targets other than the Llama until the beginning of the Llama's next turn.
Legends tell of a powerful fey creature spoken of in whispers as the Laser Llama. The legends say this mythical llama can fly and conjure blasts of pure radiance to smite its foes...

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The Monkey adds double its Proficiency Bonus to any Acrobatics checks it makes (included above).

trait.name: Opposable Thumbs
entries: The Monkey can manipulate tools and objects as well as a Commoner, though it cannot wield weapons, shields, or complex artisan's tools.

trait.name: Prehensile Tail
entries: The Monkey can use its tail to hold Tiny objects and grab surfaces to aid in climbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The Mule counts as one size larger for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Mule has advantage on saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} or moved against its will.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick
entries: When a creature the Mule can see enters its reach, it can make one Hooves attack against it.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Octopus can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Octopus can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes while it is out of the water.

trait.name: Oozing Form
entries: The Octopus can move through gaps as narrow as 1-inch wide without having to squeeze.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The Octopus has advantage on Stealth checks made to Hide while it is underwater.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage. If the target is equal to its size or smaller it is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 12}) and the Octopus can only attack it with this Tentacle.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Long or Short Rest)
entries: When the Octopus is targeted by an attack it can see while it is underwater, it can fill its space with ink, then move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. The ink heavily obscures its space for 1 minute or until it is dispersed.

trait.name: Hunter's Senses
entries: The Owl adds double its Proficiency Bonus to Perception checks (included above).

trait.name: Nocturnal Hunter
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the Owl has advantage on Stealth checks and it does not provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The Ox counts as one size larger for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Ox moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target with its Gore, and if the target is equal to the Ox in size (or smaller) it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Panther has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the Panther moves 20 ft. in a line, then hits a target equal to its size (or smaller) with its Claw attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. If it falls {@condition Prone|XPHB}, the Panther can then use its bonus action to make one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Twilight Camouflage
entries: The Panther has advantage on all Stealth checks while it is in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The Raven can perfectly mimic simple sounds it has heard, like a person's voice or an animal chittering. A successful {@dc 10} Insight check reveals this mimicry.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Reef Shark can only breathe underwater.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The Reef Shark knows the direction of any creature with less than its maximum hit points within 1 mile, so long as they are in the same body of water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature the Reef Shark can sense within 30 feet is hit by an attack, the Reef Shark moves up to half its speed and makes one Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Rodent has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sense of smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

bonus.name: Scamper
entries: The Rodent can Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Pincer
entries: If the Scorpion hits a target with its Claw attack it can automatically Grapple the target (escape {@dc 6}). If the target is larger than the Scorpion, its speed isn't reduced to 0, but the Scorpion automatically moves with it.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1  piercing damage. On hit, the target must make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 9}) or it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} until its next turn ends.

trait.name: Arachnid
entries: The Spider can climb sheer surfaces, upside down, and along webs without an ability check. It also ignores movement restrictions caused by webs and it can sense other creatures touching the same web as it.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5-6}
entries: If the Spider hits a creature with its Bite attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 9}). On a failure it is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.

A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d4} poison damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this venom is stable, but it is {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} until it regains hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Web Strand
entries: The Spider shoots a thin strand of webbing at a target it can see within 10 ft., forming a continuous line of webbing from where it is standing to the target.

trait.name: Cervine Leap
entries: The Stag can long jump up to 30 ft. and high jump up to 15 ft. with only a 10 ft. running start.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: When the Stag moves at least 20 ft. in a line and hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with its Antler attack, it is knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and the Stag can use a bonus action to use its Hooves against it.

action.name: Antler
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Kick
entries: When a creature the Stag can see enters its reach it can make one Hooves attack against it.

trait.name: Sturdy
entries: The Tortoise has advantage on saving throws to resist being moved against its will.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 1 slashing damage.

action.name: Withdraw
entries: The Tortoise recedes into its shell gaining a +2 bonus to its Armor Class but its speed becomes 0.  As an action, it can emerge and return to normal.

trait.name: Cold-Blooded
entries: When the Viper takes cold damage its speed is halved and it cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Thermal Vision
entries: The Viper knows the exact location of any warm-blooded creatures within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Venomous {@recharge 5-6}
entries: If the Viper hits a creature with a Strike attack it can force it to make a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 10}). On a failure, the creature takes {@damage 2d4} poison damage and is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}.
A {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends, but on a failure, it takes {@damage 1d4} poison damage.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4 +2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Carrion Sense
entries: The Vulture has advantage on Perception checks to smell any creatures within 120 feet of it that are below their hit point maximum. It also automatically succeeds on Perception checks to smell dead creatures that are within 1 mile of it.

trait.name: Keen Sight & Smell
entries: The Vulture has advantage on all Wisdom ability checks that rely on its sight or smell.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature within 30 feet that the Vulture can see is hit by an attack, the Vulture can move up to half its speed and make a Beak attack against it.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The Walrus can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes while it is underwater.

trait.name: Thick Hide
entries: Whenever the Walrus takes damage it can reduce it by its Constitution modifier (2). Force, psychic, and radiant damage ignore this feature.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and if the target is smaller than the Walrus, its speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing & Smell
entries: The Wild Dog has advantage on Wisdom ability checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Wild Dog has advantage on attack rolls against hostile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Wild Dog.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature that the Wild Dog can see within 30 feet is hit by an attack, the Wild Dog moves up to half its speed and make a Bite attack against it.

trait.name: Keen Hearing & Smell
entries: The Wolf has advantage on any Wisdom ability checks that rely on its hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Wolf has advantage on any attack rolls against hostiile targets that are within 5 feet of another conscious creature that is allied with the Wolf.

trait.name: Strong Jaws
entries: If the Wolf hits a creature equal to its size (or smaller) with a Bite attack, it can Grapple the target in its jaws (escape {@dc 11}). When Grappling a creature it cannot use its Bite attack on other targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
